name: R5-EvidenceVariable-R4-EvidenceVariable
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 EvidenceVariable into FHIR R4

element.display: A definition of an exposure, outcome, or other variable

target.display: A population, intervention, or exposure definition
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EvidenceVariable`

element.display: Actual or conceptual
When the resource was approved by publisher

target.display: When the evidence variable was approved by publisher
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.approvalDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EvidenceVariable.approvalDate`

element.display: Who authored the content

target.display: Who authored the content
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.author` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EvidenceVariable.author`

element.display: A grouping for ordinal or polychotomous variables
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Description of the grouping
Definition of the grouping
A defining factor of the EvidenceVariable

target.display: What defines the members of the evidence element
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic` - characteristic made the element mandatory; characteristic increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1

element.display: Used to specify how two or more characteristics are combined
A defining factor of the characteristic
all-of | any-of | at-least | at-most | statistical | net-effect | dataset
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Provides the value of "n" when "at-least" or "at-most" codes are used
Defines the characteristic using type and value
Device used for determining characteristic
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Method for how the characteristic value was determined
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Reference point for valueQuantity or valueRange
Expresses the type of characteristic
Defines the characteristic when coupled with characteristic.type

target.display: What code or expression defines members?
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionCanonical` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]` - definition[x] made the element mandatory; definition[x] increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; definition[x] has change due to type change: R5 `definitionCanonical` `canonical` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `definition[x]`

target.display: What code or expression defines members?
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionCodeableConcept` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]` - definition[x] made the element mandatory; definition[x] increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1

target.display: What code or expression defines members?
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionExpression` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]` - definition[x] made the element mandatory; definition[x] increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; definition[x] has change due to type change: R5 `definitionExpression` `Expression` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `definition[x]`

element.display: Defines the characteristic (without using type and value) by an id

target.display: What code or expression defines members?
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionReference` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]` - definition[x] made the element mandatory; definition[x] increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; definition[x] has change due to type change: R5 `definitionReference` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `definition[x]`

element.display: Natural language description of the characteristic

target.display: Natural language description of the characteristic
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 description

element.display: Length of time in which the characteristic is met
Whether the characteristic is an inclusion criterion or exclusion criterion

target.display: Whether the characteristic includes or excludes members
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.exclude` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.exclude`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.id`

element.display: Number of occurrences meeting the characteristic
Label for internal linking

target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

Used to express the observation at a defined amount of time before or after the event
Used to express the observation within a period before and/or after the event
